info.+content: The Straw Hats journey to Elegia island to see the iconic Uta in concert. But it's not all music and games as quickly chaos breaks out with the Big Mom pirates, Navy, Heart pirates, and more joining the fray. Luffy and Uta are old friends, but in the fighting old wounds are opened and lives are at risk.
"Kaze no Yukue" (風のゆくえ; Where the Wind Goes) by Ado
"Sekai no Tsudzuki" (世界のつづき; The World Continues) by Ado
"Utakata Lullaby" (ウタカタララバイ; Transient Lullaby) by Ado
"Watashi wa Saikyou" (私は最強; I'm the Strongest) by Ado
劇場版『ONE PIECE FILM RED』公式サイト
